name: John G Brenner Investigations LLC Reviews

review.title: “You can really learn alot from Mr. Brenner about working very complex cases.”
review.pros: Pros – The boss is so smart and had a great background. He knows so much about criminal justice and he has so much integrity. A great guy.
review.cons: Cons – It can go from very, very busy to dead, weak after week, things change to fast one minute your working a muder def next your working a divorce case.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Stay as close as you can to Mr Brenner, he is the key, if he likes you, he will teach you everything, he has a great sense of humor and really cares about his cases.
